All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnimationsAdapter
Default JavaFX implementation of IAnimations.
Card
Represents a single Uno card, including its value, color, image, and a JavaFX Rectangle used for rendering in the UI.
Deck
Represents the Uno deck, including creation, shuffling, and card drawing.
GameException
Base checked exception type for UNO gameâ€“specific errors.
GameException.EmptyTableException
Thrown when accessing the top card on the table but there are no cards placed.
GameException.GameEndedException
Thrown when an action is attempted after the game has already ended.
GameException.IllegalCardColor
Thrown when a card has an illegal or unexpected color.
GameException.IllegalCardValue
Thrown when a card has an illegal or unexpected value.
GameException.InvalidCardIndex
Thrown when attempting to access a card in a hand using an invalid index.
GameException.NullCardException
Thrown when a null Card is encountered where a valid instance is required.
GameException.NullPlayerException
Thrown when a required player reference is missing or null.
GameException.OutOfCardsInDeck
Thrown when the deck runs out of cards and a draw is attempted.
GameException.ThreadInitializationException
Thrown when a thread required by the game cannot be created or prepared correctly.
GameException.ThreadInterruptedException
Wraps an InterruptedException or similar interruption during thread operations within the game model or controller logic.
GameUno
Core model for an Uno match.
GameUnoController
Controller for the Uno game screen.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
IAnimations
Abstraction for simple UI effects over JavaFX Nodes.
IGameUno
Interface representing the Uno game functionality.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
ISerializableFileHandler
Defines methods for serializing and deserializing game objects to and from files.
Main
The main class of the Uno Game application.
Player
Represents a player participating in the Uno game.
SerializableFileHandler
Implements ISerializableFileHandler using Java's built-in object serialization.
Table
Represents the shared table (discard pile/top card) in the Uno game.
Table.TableRecycleException
 
ThreadPlayMachine
Background thread that automates the machine player's turns.
ThreadSingUNOMachine
Background worker that simulates the machine's behavior for calling "UNO".
ThreadWinGame
Background worker that detects end-of-game conditions and announces the winner.
UnoEnum
Enumerates all image asset keys used by the Uno game and resolves each to a classpath resource path.
WelcomeStage
Primary welcome window for the Uno application.
WelcomeStageController
Controller for the welcome screen.
